I would greatly appreciate any help with a French translation (or any language for that matter). Please send me (dahall) a direct message by clicking on my name to the left here and then clicking the "Contact" envelope and typing a message. This will allow me to reply directly to your email with the files I have with translations for you to fill out. Once you return them, I'll roll them into the next release.
